verses.verse: אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשְׂמַ֨ח <S%H8055><s%> Rejoice יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל ׀ <S%H3478><s%> not O Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> with גִּיל֙ <S%H1524><s%> for joy כָּֽעַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> as [other] people כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for זָנִ֖יתָ <S%H2181><s%> for thou hast gone a whoring מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> and אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> from thy God אָהַ֣בְתָּ <S%H157><s%> thou hast loved אֶתְנָ֔ן <S%H868><s%> a reward עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every גָּרְנ֥וֹת <S%H1637><s%> threshing דָּגָֽן׃ <S%H1715><s%> corn

גֹּ֥רֶן <S%H1637><s%> The floor וָיֶ֖קֶב <S%H3342><s%> and the winepress לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will not יִרְעֵ֑ם <S%H7462><s%> shall not feed וְתִיר֖וֹשׁ <S%H8492><s%> them and the new wine יְכַ֥חֶשׁ <S%H3584><s%> shall fail בָּֽהּ׃

לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> They will not יֵשְׁב֖וּ <S%H3427><s%> They shall not dwell בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> God וְשָׁ֤ב <S%H7725><s%> shall return אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H669><s%> but Ephraim מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> to Egypt וּבְאַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> [things] in Assyria טָמֵ֥א <S%H2931><s%> unclean יֹאכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> and they shall eat

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> They will not יִסְּכ֨וּ <S%H5258><s%> They shall not offer לַיהוָ֥ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> [offerings] to the LORD יַיִן֮ <S%H3196><s%> wine וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יֶֽעֶרְבוּ־ <S%H6148><s%> engage לוֹ֒ זִבְחֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H2077><s%> unto him their sacrifices כְּלֶ֤חֶם <S%H3899><s%> [shall be] unto them as the bread אוֹנִים֙ <S%H205><s%> of mourners לָהֶ֔ם כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אֹכְלָ֖יו <S%H398><s%> all that eat יִטַמָּ֑אוּ <S%H2930><s%> thereof shall be polluted כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For לַחְמָ֣ם <S%H3899><s%> for their bread לְנַפְשָׁ֔ם <S%H5315><s%> for their soul לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> It will not יָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> shall not come בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> into the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

מַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> What תַּעֲשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> What will ye do לְי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> in the solemn וּלְי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> and in the day חַג־ <S%H2282><s%> of the feast יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> behold הָֽלְכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> For lo they are gone מִשֹּׁ֔ד <S%H7701><s%> because of destruction מִצְרַ֥יִם <S%H4714><s%> Egypt תְּקַבְּצֵ֖ם <S%H6908><s%> shall gather them up מֹ֣ף <S%H4644><s%> Memphis תְּקַבְּרֵ֑ם <S%H6912><s%> shall bury מַחְמַ֣ד <S%H4261><s%> them the pleasant לְכַסְפָּ֗ם <S%H3701><s%> [places] for their silver קִמּוֹשׂ֙ <S%H7057><s%> nettles יִֽירָשֵׁ֔ם <S%H3423><s%> shall possess ח֖וֹחַ <S%H2336><s%> them thorns בְּאָהֳלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H168><s%> [shall be] in their tabernacles

בָּ֣אוּ ׀ <S%H935><s%> are come יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> The days הַפְּקֻדָּ֗ה <S%H6486><s%> of visitation בָּ֚אוּ <S%H935><s%> are come יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> the days הַשִׁלֻּ֔ם <S%H7966><s%> of recompence יֵדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> shall know יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel אֱוִ֣יל <S%H191><s%> [is] a fool הַנָּבִ֗יא <S%H5030><s%> [it] the prophet מְשֻׁגָּע֙ <S%H7696><s%> [is] mad אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man הָר֔וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> the spiritual עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> Because רֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> for the multitude עֲוֹנְךָ֔ <S%H5771><s%> of thine iniquity וְרַבָּ֖ה <S%H7227><s%> and the great מַשְׂטֵמָֽה׃ <S%H4895><s%> hatred

צֹפֶ֥ה <S%H6822><s%> The watchman אֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֱלֹהָ֑י <S%H430><s%> [was] with my God נָבִ֞יא <S%H5030><s%> [but] the prophet פַּ֤ח <S%H6341><s%> [is] a snare יָקוֹשׁ֙ <S%H3352><s%> of a fowler עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is in כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דְּרָכָ֔יו <S%H1870><s%> in all his ways מַשְׂטֵמָ֖ה <S%H4895><s%> [and] hatred בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <S%H430><s%> of his God

הֶעְמִֽיקוּ־ <S%H6009><s%> They have deeply שִׁחֵ֖תוּ <S%H7843><s%> corrupted כִּימֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> [themselves] as in the days הַגִּבְעָ֑ה <S%H1390><s%> of Gibeah יִזְכּ֣וֹר <S%H2142><s%> [therefore] he will remember עֲוֹנָ֔ם <S%H5771><s%> their iniquity יִפְק֖וֹד <S%H6485><s%> he will visit חַטֹּאותָֽם׃ <S%H2403><s%> their sins ס

כַּעֲנָבִ֣ים <S%H6025><s%> like grapes בַּמִּדְבָּ֗ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness מָצָ֙אתִי֙ <S%H4672><s%> I found יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel כְּבִכּוּרָ֤ה <S%H1063><s%> as the firstripe בִתְאֵנָה֙ <S%H8384><s%> in the fig tree בְּרֵ֣אשִׁיתָ֔הּ <S%H7225><s%> at her first time רָאִ֖יתִי <S%H7200><s%> I saw אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> your fathers הֵ֜מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> [but] they went בַֽעַל־ פְּע֗וֹר <S%H1187><s%> to Baalpeor וַיִּנָּֽזְרוּ֙ <S%H5144><s%> and separated לַבֹּ֔שֶׁת <S%H1322><s%> themselves unto [that] shame וַיִּהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> became שִׁקּוּצִ֖ים <S%H8251><s%> and [their] abominations כְּאָהֳבָֽם׃ <S%H157><s%> were according as they loved

אֶפְרַ֕יִם <S%H669><s%> [As for] Ephraim כָּע֖וֹף <S%H5775><s%> like a bird יִתְעוֹפֵ֣ף <S%H5774><s%> shall fly away כְּבוֹדָ֑ם <S%H3519><s%> their glory מִלֵּדָ֥ה <S%H3205><s%> from the birth וּמִבֶּ֖טֶן <S%H990><s%> and from the womb וּמֵהֵרָיֽוֹן׃ <S%H2032><s%> and from the conception

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Yes אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo יְגַדְּלוּ֙ <S%H1431><s%> Though they bring up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H1121><s%> their children וְשִׁכַּלְתִּ֖ים <S%H7921><s%> yet will I bereave מֵֽאָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> them [that there shall] not [be] a man כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Yes גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> indeed א֥וֹי <S%H188><s%> [left] yea woe לָהֶ֖ם בְּשׂוּרִ֥י <S%H5493><s%> also to them when I depart מֵהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

אֶפְרַ֛יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> I רָאִ֥יתִי <S%H7200><s%> as I saw לְצ֖וֹר <S%H6865><s%> Tyrus שְׁתוּלָ֣ה <S%H8362><s%> [is] planted בְנָוֶ֑ה <S%H5116><s%> in a pleasant place וְאֶפְרַ֕יִם <S%H669><s%> but Ephraim לְהוֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> shall bring forth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הֹרֵ֖ג <S%H2026><s%> to the murderer בָּנָֽיו׃ <S%H1121><s%> his children

תֵּן־ <S%H5414><s%> Give לָהֶ֥ם יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> them O LORD מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> how long תִּתֵּ֑ן <S%H5414><s%> what wilt thou give תֵּן־ <S%H5414><s%> ? give לָהֶם֙ רֶ֣חֶם <S%H7358><s%> womb מַשְׁכִּ֔יל <S%H7921><s%> them a miscarrying וְשָׁדַ֖יִם <S%H7699><s%> breasts צֹמְקִֽים׃ <S%H6784><s%> and dry

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All רָעָתָ֤ם <S%H7451><s%> All their wickedness בַּגִּלְגָּל֙ <S%H1537><s%> [is] in Gilgal כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Indeed שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> there שְׂנֵאתִ֔ים <S%H8130><s%> for there I hated עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> Because רֹ֣עַ <S%H7455><s%> them for the wickedness מַֽעַלְלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H4611><s%> of their doings מִבֵּיתִ֖י <S%H1004><s%> of mine house אֲגָרְשֵׁ֑ם <S%H1644><s%> I will drive them out לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> no אוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3254><s%> them no more אַהֲבָתָ֔ם <S%H160><s%> I will love כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All שָׂרֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H8269><s%> all their princes סֹרְרִֽים׃ <S%H5637><s%> [are] revolters

הֻכָּ֣ה <S%H5221><s%> is smitten אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim שָׁרְשָׁ֥ם <S%H8328><s%> their root יָבֵ֖שׁ <S%H3001><s%> is dried up פְּרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> no fruit [בְלִי־ כ] (בַֽל־ <S%H1097><s%> corruption יַעֲשׂ֑וּן <S%H1077><s%> lest ק) גַּ֚ם <S%H1571><s%> Even כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> though יֵֽלֵד֔וּן <S%H3205><s%> yea though they bring forth וְהֵמַתִּ֖י <S%H4191><s%> yet will I slay מַחֲמַדֵּ֥י <S%H4261><s%> [even] the beloved בִטְנָֽם׃ <S%H990><s%> [fruit] of their womb ס

יִמְאָסֵ֣ם <S%H3988><s%> will cast them away אֱלֹהַ֔י <S%H430><s%> My God כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> Because לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> have not שָׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> because they did not hearken ל֑וֹ וְיִהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become נֹדְדִ֖ים <S%H5074><s%> unto him and they shall be wanderers בַּגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> among the nations ס
